Hey!
This is my first app which I made to learn Java and Android App Development. It's a simple, basic and stupid app, made only for ''educational purposes'' only. The Menu contents are explained as follows:
1. BasicCountTool: This tool does basic +/- 1 and resets back to 0
2. PlayWithText: This tool, at the moment, accepts only 4 commands: left center right WTF The On/Off switch is to hide the command which is about to be typed (This feature has been disabled for the time being)
3. Email: This tool, ah well, just follow the cues
4. Camera: This tool allows you to click a picture with your phone's camera, displays a thumbnail and then allows you to set it as a wallpaper
